fields.name: action
fields.comment: The action taken by the DLP device.

fields.name: app
fields.comment: The application involved in the event.

fields.name: category
fields.comment: The category of the DLP event.

fields.name: dest
fields.comment: The target of the DLP event.

fields.name: dest_zone
fields.comment: The zone of the DLP target.

fields.name: dlp_type
fields.comment: The type of DLP system that generated the event.

fields.name: dvc
fields.comment: The device that reported the DLP event.

fields.name: dvc_zone
fields.comment: The zone of the DLP device.

fields.name: object
fields.comment: The name of the affected object.

fields.name: object_category
fields.comment: The category of the affected object.

fields.name: object_path
fields.comment: The path of the affected object.

fields.name: severity
fields.comment: The severity of the DLP event.

fields.name: signature
fields.comment: The name of the DLP event.

fields.name: src
fields.comment: The source of the DLP event.

fields.name: src_user
fields.comment: The source user of the DLP event.

fields.name: src_zone
fields.comment: The zone of the DLP source.

fields.name: user
fields.comment: The target user of the DLP event.

fields.name: vendor_product
fields.comment: The vendor and product name of the DLP system
